title: Buildings having height more than 32 m upto 70 m, at least one side, accessible from road side, shall have clear open space of 9 m at ground level
clause_text: Buildings having height more than 32 m upto 70 m, at least one side, accessible from road side, shall have clear open space of 9 m at ground level.
